tool_description: Configures trial period settings, limitations, and conversion strategies for subscription plans including trial length, feature restrictions, and post-trial actions.

trial_duration_days.description: Length of trial period in days (1-365)

trial_type.description: Type of trial offering (free, paid, freemium, limited_feature)

feature_limitations.description: List of features to restrict during trial period

usage_caps.description: Usage limits for trial users (corresponding to features)

credit_card_required.description: Whether credit card is required to start trial

auto_conversion.description: Whether trial automatically converts to paid subscription

error_messages: Invalid trial duration: Trial period must be between 1 and 365 days.
Invalid trial type: Must be one of [free, paid, freemium, limited_feature].
Usage caps mismatch: If provided, usage_caps array must match feature_limitations array length.
Invalid conversion discount: Discount must be between 0 and 50 percent.
Invalid usage cap values: All usage caps must be positive integers.
usage: Specify trial_duration_days and trial_type. Optionally configure feature_limitations, usage_caps, credit_card_required, auto_conversion, and conversion_discount for comprehensive trial management.

trial_config_id.description: Unique identifier for the trial configuration

trial_end_date.description: Calculated trial end date in ISO 8601 format

conversion_strategy.description: Recommended conversion strategy based on configuration
